title: PTI only federal party with national agenda:Fawad
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 07 (APP):Minister for Information and Broadcasting Chaudhry Fawad Hussain said on Sunday that  Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf (PTI) was only national party and it had the national agenda.
In a tweet, he said that Pakistan’s opposition was fragmented having no similarity in ideology.
He said some parties have vote bank in one division while some other had repression in three divisions.
They have no leader, no programme, which have been striving to remain in the news, by announcement of movement against the country’s only federal party, he remarked.
